channel.title: Music ID (Idea)
channel.description:
So a friend and I thought about this cool new phone feature. Well everybody knows about phone ID, and caller ID, Voice ID etc.
A "Music ID" would be pretty cool. With a ringtone a music is played that YOU CHOOSE. It would be cool if somehow if
person A: Sets a music id to send to other person for his phone call person B: -gets the music id of the caller- -takes the message by answering the phone.
Sort of a stupid idea I know but meh we were bored earlier so was trying to think up ideas xD

item.title: Music ID (Idea)
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Good idea, I will call Romney with this music:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U06jlgpMtQs[/youtube]
And make every stupid fuck around him think that he is a communist.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Multiple phone service providers already do this.

Read full topic

item.title: Music ID (Idea)
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

I feel like while I’m in school I’d get a bunch of stupid songs going off like Show me your genitals, every 5 minutes.

Read full topic

item.title: Music ID (Idea)
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:15, topic:440560”]Step 1 - Set music ID to rick roll
Step 2 - Start random dialing
Step 3 - TROLOLOLOL[/quote]
sHAHHAHAHAHH

Read full topic

item.title: Music ID (Idea)
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

And if the the music industry had their way with it, they would require that the persons receiving and sending the music id payed $5.99 to use it…once…

Read full topic

item.title: Music ID (Idea)
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

There was a text message that did this a while back… you would get a picture of boobs… and your volume will be put on loud and it would say “I am looking at porn” repeating it. So if you were in class, what an embarrassment.

Read full topic

item.title: Music ID (Idea)
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

It would be extremely easy to abuse, anyone could set their id to a song with lots of profanity.

Take for example someone sets their ID as ‘nigga nigga nigga’ and the person who they call is at a racial integration meeting or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Music ID (Idea)
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:10, topic:440560”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=543239.msg3981592#msg3981592 date=1335327724]
I have it so when somebody calls me it plays music instead of ringing.
Like they hear the music, my phone jus does it’s ringtone
[/quote]I am not sure I understand what you just said <3[/quote]

When people call him, it plays music instead of ‘riiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiing… riiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiing…’ and he (not the caller) hears his phone ringing instead of the sound the caller is hearing.

Read full topic

item.title: Music ID (Idea)
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:9, topic:440560”]I have it so when somebody calls me it plays music instead of ringing.
Like they hear the music, my phone jus does it’s ringtone[/quote]I am not sure I understand what you just said <3

Read full topic

item.title: Music ID (Idea)
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

I have it so when somebody calls me it plays music instead of ringing.
Like they hear the music, my phone jus does it’s ringtone

item.title: Music ID (Idea)
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Dunder Mifflin, post:7, topic:440560”][quote author=zzjimmy link=topic=543239.msg3981563#msg3981563 date=1335324058]
Uhhh I get what your saying but, I think it would be the ideal practical joke especially if you’re the only one with that feature. I would start calling my friends using embarrasing songs XD
[/quote]

expanding on his idea. It would be bad. If it ever did happen, you should have an option n contacts to disable/enable the effect on the certain number. People would use it as a joke if not used professionally.[/quote]I would imagine if it ever actually was made it would have become a downloadable app from the market or something anyway. So, youc ould always add a disable/enable option.

Read full topic

item.title: Music ID (Idea)
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

zzjimmy:

Uhhh I get what your saying but, I think it would be the ideal practical joke especially if you’re the only one with that feature. I would start calling my friends using embarrasing songs XD

expanding on his idea. It would be bad. If it ever did happen, you should have an option n contacts to disable/enable the effect on the certain number. People would use it as a joke if not used professionally.

Read full topic

item.title: Music ID (Idea)
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:3, topic:440560”]I think what he is suggesting is that I set my song to “man in the box - Alice in chains” and whoever I call that song plays regardless if they have it set or not.[/quote]^ this

zzjimmy:

That would get so ANNOYING but, I think it would be pretty funny if every time you texted someone, they would receive a silly ring tone

Dude IKR! But it does have it’s uses. Like for example, your having an affair the girl plays a certain ringtone to tell you its her without showing her face or anything. She could play a different ringtone if she isn’t sure if your alone , etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Music ID (Idea)
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

You can customize your ring tone to play a certain sound file when that person calls you.
